body:
I just updated to the latest Spack, and am on a "clean" install with a new `~/.spack` directory.  The Spack download cache (#579) is just not appearing.  Not in the `var/spack/cache` directory.  Does anyone know why?

 (OK; my Spack is actually the latest with a couple of PR's merged in).
title: Tarball cache not happening
